Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.parser.Escape
    use DefaultEscaping instance
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.llp.ExtendedMinLowerLayerProtocol
    call MinLowerLayerProtocol.MinLowerLayerProtocol(boolean) and pass true as argument
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.util.MessageIDGenerator
    use one of the IDGenerator implementations
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.util.MessageQuery 
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.validation.impl.RegexPrimitiveRule
    use BuilderSupport.matches(String) instead
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.validation.impl.SizeRule
    use BuilderSupport#maxLength() instead
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.validation.impl.TrimLeadingWhitespace
    use PrimitiveRuleBuilder.leftTrim() instead
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.validation.impl.TrimTrailingWhitespace
    use PrimitiveRuleBuilder.leftTrim() instead
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.validation.impl.WithdrawnDatatypeRule
    use BuilderSupport.withdrawn() instead

  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.AbstractSegment.add(Class<? extends Type>, boolean, int, int, Object[])
    Use AbstractSegment.add(Class, boolean, int, int, Object[], String)
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.conf.store.ProfileStoreFactory.addCodeStore(CodeStore)
    use CodeStoreRegistry.addCodeStore(CodeStore)
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.conf.store.ProfileStoreFactory.addCodeStore(CodeStore, String)
    use CodeStoreRegistry.addCodeStore(CodeStore, String)
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Varies.fixOBX5(Segment, ModelClassFactory)
    use FixOBX5#fixOBX5
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Varies.fixOBX5(Segment, ModelClassFactory, ParserConfiguration)
    use FixOBX5#fixOBX5
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.AbstractMessage.generateACK(String, HL7Exception) 
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Message.generateACK(String, HL7Exception)
    use Message.generateACK(AcknowledgmentCode, HL7Exception)
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.conf.store.ProfileStoreFactory.getCodeStore(String, String)
    use CodeStoreRegistry.getCodeStore(String, String)
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.HapiContext.getConnectionHub()
    use HapiContext.newClient(String, int, boolean)
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.llp.LLPException.getException()
    Use Throwable.getCause()
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.app.ConnectionHub.getInstance()
    Use HapiContext.getConnectionHub() to get an instance of ConnectionHub. See this example page for an example of how to use ConnectionHub.
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.app.ConnectionHub.getInstance(ExecutorService)
    Use HapiContext.getConnectionHub() to get an instance of ConnectionHub. See this example page for an example of how to use ConnectionHub.
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.app.ConnectionHub.getInstance(HapiContext)
    Use HapiContext.getConnectionHub() to get an instance of ConnectionHub. See this example page for an example of how to use ConnectionHub.
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.parser.XMLParser.getKeepAsOriginalNodes()
    Use ParserConfiguration.getXmlDisableWhitespaceTrimmingOnNodeNames() instead
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.parser.PipeParser.getMessageStructure(String)
    this method should not be public
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.parser.Parser.getMessageStructureForEvent(String, String)
    use ModelClassFactory.getMessageStructureForEvent(String, Version)
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.parser.PipeParser.isLegacyMode()
    This will be removed in HAPI 3.0
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.app.HL7Service.keepRunning()
    Use Service.isRunning(). Deprecated as of version 0.6.
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.app.DefaultApplication.makeACK(Message)
    use Message.generateACK()
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.app.DefaultApplication.makeACK(Segment)
    use Message.generateACK()
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.llp.LowerLayerProtocol.makeLLP()
    as there is now the choice between MinLowerLayerProtocol and ExtendedMinLowerLayerProtocol.
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.app.HL7Service.registerApplication(String, String, Application)
    use HL7Service.registerApplication(String, String, ca.uhn.hl7v2.protocol.ReceivingApplication) and AppWrapper
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.parser.XMLParser.setKeepAsOriginalNodes(String[])
    Use ParserConfiguration.setXmlDisableWhitespaceTrimmingOnNodeNames(Set) instead. That method works exactly the same as this one but has been renamed for a more clear meaning.
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.parser.PipeParser.setLegacyMode(boolean)
    This will be removed in HAPI 3.0
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.parser.Parser.setParserConfiguration(ParserConfiguration)
    use a dedicated HapiContext and set its ParserConfiguration property
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.conf.store.ProfileStoreFactory.setStore(ProfileStore)
    use HapiContext to define the ProfileStore to be used
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.app.Initiator.setTimeoutMillis(int)
    use Initiator.setTimeout(long, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit)}
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.parser.Parser.setValidationContext(ValidationContext)
    use a dedicated HapiContext and set its ValidationContext property
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.parser.GenericParser.setValidationContext(ValidationContext)
    use a dedicated HapiContext and set its ValidationContext property
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.app.ConnectionHub.shutdown()
    default executor service is shut down automatically
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.validation.PrimitiveTypeRule.test(String)
    use Rule.apply(Object)
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.parser.Parser.validVersion(String)
    Use Version.supportsVersion(String)
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.protocol.impl.ApplicationRouterImpl()
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.protocol.impl.ApplicationRouterImpl(HapiContext, Parser)
    define parser over context

    ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.DataTypeException(String, int, Throwable) 
    ca.uhn.hl7v2.HL7Exception(String, int)
    use HL7Exception(String, ErrorCode)

    use HL7Exception(String, ErrorCode, Throwable)
